abstract: Research in Motion's BlackBerry outage spread to the United States late on Tuesday, leaving Wall Street bankers without their usual e-mail and messaging fix.
snippet: Research in Motion's BlackBerry outage spread to the United States late on Tuesday, leaving Wall Street bankers without their usual e-mail and messaging fix.
lead_paragraph: Wednesday had the makings of a relatively good day for Wall Street. The stock market was edging toward positive territory for the year. Europe was hashing out a deal to recapitalize its banks. And enraged protestors remained encamped at Zuccotti Park, letting bank chieftains breath easy in their Park Avenue palaces.
